name: Bugs Stick Together
description:
A fabulous online multiplayer adventure made with Photon 2 and Unity.

2 players can join a room together and survive against countless hordes of beetles, using their bond as a weapon! It's as easy as it sounds...

- Create a room and share the room code with a friend

- The second player joins the room and waits for the host to start the game

- You both play and have fun xD
